title: Tata Power appoints Deepesh Nanda as president of renewables and CEO & MD of TPREL
description: Tata Power, a major integrated power company in India, has appointed Deepesh Nanda as the President-Renewables and CEO & MD of Tata Power Renewable Energy Limited (TPREL), a subsidiary of Tata Power, effective from November 1, 2023. Nanda succeeds Ashish Khanna, who will take on the role of President, Generation Business.
